org.pikater.shared.database.views.tableview.datasets.metadata

Class NumericalMetaDataTableDBView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.shared.database.views.tableview.base.AbstractTableDBView
      • org.pikater.shared.database.views.tableview.datasets.metadata.NumericalMetaDataTableDBView

  • public class NumericalMetaDataTableDBView
extends AbstractTableDBView
    A generic view for tables displaying numerical metadata information for a dataset.
